name: Half Ghost Girl in Red House
name_original: Half Ghost Girl in Red House
description:
A Touhou Fangame created in 6 days and 19 hours for the 2021 Touhou Station Jam. (https://touhou-gamejam.web.app/en/)

Explore the Scarlet Devil Mansion as Youmu Konpaku, who is trying to recover an item that was supposedly stolen from her master, Lady Yuyuko. Switch between Youmu's human and phantom half to solve puzzles and fight enemies to progress through a small dungeon.

Controls:
Walk - Arrow Keys/Dpad/Joystick
Attack, Confirm - Z/Y/Button A
Switch between human and phantom half - X/Button X
Call phantom half back to human half - C/Button Y
Return/Start - Pause

Credits:
Programming/Art/Design - Trace
Music - Miles Yalzin
SFX/Title Art - Saemi
